Uses of Filter in rit.eyeTrackingAPI.SmoothingFilters
 

Subclasses of Filter in rit.eyeTrackingAPI.SmoothingFilters
 class FixationAndLeastSquaresFilter
          A filtering algorithm that uses a combination of of smoothing based on grouping raw data into fixations if the raw data points are within a certain radius and of using linear trend lines to smooth out saccades.
